lead_paragraph: Zinedine Zidane faces his greatest challenge in a glittering and scandal-hit career after taking over the notoriously unstable helm of Real Madrid on Monday for his first major coaching job.

headline.print_headline: Zidane Takes on 1st Major Challenge as Madrid Coach
headline.main: Zidane Takes on 1st Major Challenge as Madrid Coach

snippet: Zinedine Zidane faces his greatest challenge in a glittering and scandal-hit career after taking over the notoriously unstable helm of Real Madrid on Monday for his first major coaching job....
